property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play or be affected by cards that refer specifically to Stone Cold Steve Austin or Triple H. You may also use their Superstar specific foil cards. At the end of the Pre-match phase, determine if you are the player with the highest Superstar Value. If so, add 3 cards to your starting hand. Opponent cannot play the cards titled: Backed by Stephanie McMahon or Billion Dollar Princess. You may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played by The Two Man Power Trip, this card is -9F. Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Search your Ringside pile and Arsenal for the card titled ...'Cause Stone Cold Said So!, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when the card titled And That's the Bottom Line... is in your Ring area. You may put 1 Action card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your next card played this turn is F:0.

card.name: It's Time to Play the Game

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's, take any 4 cards from your Ringside pile and shuffle them into your Arsenal. If your Fortitude Rating is equal to your opponent's, remove any 1 card from your opponent's Ring area and place it in his Ringside pile. If your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card he must discard.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this card and 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, draw 2 cards, and then discard 1 card. As a reversal, reverse the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle and end your opponent's turn. Overturn 3 cards and then put 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must play a Heel maneuver card before playing this card. When successfully played, you may take 2 cards in your opponent's Ring area and put them into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play or be affected by cards that refer specifically to Undertaker/Deadman Inc. or Kane. You may play the card titled Brothers Âµtil the End. You may forfeit drawing a card at the start of your turn, and place the top 2 cards of your Arsenal into your Ringside pile. Then choose any card in your Ringside pile and place it in your hand. You may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Undertaker, Deadman Inc, Brothers of Destruction

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for a non-unique card of the same type of maneuver successfully played, show it to your opponent, place it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. If that maneuver is the next card you play, it is +2D and cannot be reversed.

card.name: Throttled Within an Inch of Your Life

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Undertaker, Deadman Inc, Brothers of Destruction

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand. When successfully played, he overturns cards until 2 applicable Reversal cards are revealed or until he has only 1 card in his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, before your draw segment, your opponent must overturn the top card from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile and then discard 1 card. You must overturn the top card from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: May only reverse the cards titled Throw into the Corner Turnbuckle or Irish Whip. End your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: May only reverse a Strike or Grapple maneuver, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, determine if you are the player with the highest Superstar Value. If you have the highest Superstar Value then your opponent must choose to do two of the following: Discard 2 cards, Allow you to draw 2 cards, Overturn 7 cards from his Arsenal, Play with his hand face up until the beginning of the second turn of the match, Skip his first turn, or Concede and lose the match.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the last two cards you played this turn were 4D or greater maneuvers, make note of opponent this card is played against. When this card is in your Ring Area, if opponent's Fortitude Rating is less than yours, all of his maneuver card effect text is considered blank when played.

card.name: The Bigger They Are, the Harder They Fall

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver and if your opponent's Fortitude Rating is greater than your Fortitude Rating. Search your opponent's Arsenal for any 3 Reversal cards and place them in his Ringside pile, then shuffle his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 5D or greater maneuver. While this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's Superstar Ability is considered to read as blank text. (Superstar Abilities relating to Arsenal construction are not affected

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's Backlash deck, choose 1 Pre-match card that he can play as his next card, and his next card played is the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the last two cards you played this turn were 6D or greater maneuvers, make note of opponent this card is played against. Opponent must discard 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put it in your Ringside pile to reverse any Action card played by debilitated opponent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. When successfully played, opponent must place 1 random card from his Backlash deck into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, opponent must discard 1 card.
